data.title: Dr. Martin Steinbach on LinkedIn: First time since 10 years EMEIA took the lead in IPO
data.meta_description: A remarkable comeback: For the first time since ten years, IPOs from the #EMEIA region achieving its highest global #IPO market share by number, accounted for…
data.text:
The current pipeline of MENA IPOs is promising for the remainder of 2023 and into 2024, with several prominent companies in the region having announced their intention to list on MENA exchanges. Discover more in the latest EY MENA #IPOEye Q3 2023 report https://go.ey.com/47qcK9r or reach out to Greg Hughes. #EYMENA #IPO #BetterWorkingWorld

The current pipeline of MENA IPOs is promising for the remainder of 2023 and into 2024, with several prominent companies in the region having announced their intention to list on MENA exchanges. Discover more in the latest EY MENA #IPOEye Q3 2023 report https://go.ey.com/47qcK9r or reach out to me. #EYMENA #IPO #BetterWorkingWorld

The current pipeline of MENA IPOs is promising for the remainder of 2023 and into 2024, with several prominent companies in the region having announced their intention to list on MENA exchanges. Discover more in the latest EY MENA #IPOEye Q3 2023 report https://go.ey.com/47qcK9r or reach out to me. #EYMENA #IPO #BetterWorkingWorld

The year started off with a promising number of IPO listings in the GCC region, showing no signs of slowdown. The momentum is set to continue as several prominent companies and funds intend to list on the MENA exchanges in 2024, across various sectors. Uncover more findings in our latest EY MENA #IPOEye Q1 2024 report https://lnkd.in/dfRtzgGJ or reach out to me. #EYMENA #IPO #BetterWorkingWorld

While TSAs can offer important benefits, their complexity makes them costly to exit in a timely manner. But it is possible to. We outline 3 things that dealmakers should know. #pwcdeals #ipo

Across Southeast Asia, the IPO market remained robust in 2023, with Indonesia, Thailand and Malaysia recording an increase in deal volume versus a five-year average. There is growing interest for companies in the region to explore cross-border listing. Learn more: https://go.ey.com/3BxttIF #IPO #BetterWorkingWorld #EY

The MENA markets saw six initial public offerings (IPOs) during Q3 2023, raising US$523m. Despite the decrease in listings and proceeds when compared to last year, the IPO pipeline for Q4 2023 and into 2024 remains promising. Find out more in our latest MENA #IPOEye Q3 2023 report: https://go.ey.com/47qcK9r Brad Watson, Gregory Hughes, Mayur Pau, Zaki Sumar, Mukeet Iqbal, Humara Suleman, Meera Kohli #EYMENA #IPO #BetterWorkingWorld

Markaz released its research report titled “Initial Public Offerings (IPO) in the GCC markets” highlighting that Saudi Arabia led the region in terms of IPO proceeds during H1-2024, raising a total of USD 2.1 billion from 19 offerings. Read more below: https://lnkd.in/eskdmZGb #Markaz #GCCIPO #CapitalMarkets #MarkazReports
